Cohort C evaluate combination treatment either 1000mg po bid RO5024048 100mg q8h RO5190591 500mg po bid RO5024048 200mg q8h RO5190591 14 day . Cohort D evaluate 1000mg po bid RO5024048 200mg q8h RO5190591 14 days.Cohort E evaluate 1000mg RO5024048/600mg RO5190591 po twice daily 14 day , Cohorts F G evaluate 1000mg RO5024048/900mg RO5190591 po twice daily 14 day . The anticipated time study treatment < 3 month , target sample size < 100 individual .
